name: Rituals
description: Rituals harness the magic of the wilds, using items to focus the power and fire as the catalyst. All are performed using a $(l:basics/pyre)pyre$() and generally take time to complete.$(br2)$(info) While portable, many higher $(l:rituals/tiers)tier$() rituals require $(l:rituals/standing_stones)standing stones or runed pillars$().$(br2)$(info) Almost every ritual can be $(l:rituals/automation)automated$() in some form.
